TableInfo.QueryValue: SELECT V.*,SEC.currprice,SEC.CURRPRICE-V.COSTPRICE CHANGEPRICE, CASE WHEN V.COSTPRICE>0 THEN ROUND((SEC.CURRPRICE-V.COSTPRICE)*100/V.COSTPRICE,2) ELSE 0 END CHANGEPERCENT, V.COSTPRICE*(V.TRADE_QTTY+V.BLOCKED+V.SECURITIES_RECEIVING+V.CPQUYENVE) TOTALVALUE, SEC.CURRPRICE*(V.TRADE_QTTY+V.BLOCKED+V.SECURITIES_RECEIVING+V.CPQUYENVE+V.CPTHUONG) CURRVALUE, SEC.CURRPRICE*(V.TRADE_QTTY+V.BLOCKED+V.SECURITIES_RECEIVING+V.CPQUYENVE+V.CPTHUONG) - V.COSTPRICE*(V.TRADE_QTTY+V.BLOCKED+V.SECURITIES_RECEIVING+V.CPQUYENVE) CHANGEVALUE, CASE WHEN V.COSTPRICE*(V.TRADE_QTTY+V.BLOCKED+V.SECURITIES_RECEIVING+V.CPQUYENVE)>0 THEN round((SEC.CURRPRICE*(V.TRADE_QTTY+V.BLOCKED+V.SECURITIES_RECEIVING+V.CPQUYENVE+V.CPTHUONG) - V.COSTPRICE*(V.TRADE_QTTY+V.BLOCKED+V.SECURITIES_RECEIVING+V.CPQUYENVE))*100/ (V.COSTPRICE*(V.TRADE_QTTY+V.BLOCKED+V.SECURITIES_RECEIVING+V.CPQUYENVE)),2) ELSE 0 END CHANGEVALP from OL_ACCOUNT_SE V,SECURITIES_INFO SEC WHERE V.SYMBOL=SEC.SYMBOL AND V.AFACCTNO=:SAFACCTNO AND V.SYMBOL LIKE :SSYMBOL ORDER BY V.SYMBOL ASC
SELECT PP FROM BUF_CI_ACCOUNT WHERE AFACCTNO=:SAFACCTNO

SELECT mr.mrtype, mr.isppused, NVL (rsk.mrratioloan, 0) mrratioloan, NVL (mrpriceloan, 0) mrpriceloan FROM afmast mst, aftype af, mrtype mr, (SELECT * FROM afserisk r, sbsecurities sb WHERE r.codeid = sb.codeid AND sb.symbol = 'SSYMBOL') rsk WHERE mst.acctno = 'SAFACCTNO' AND mst.actype = af.actype AND af.mrtype = mr.actype AND af.actype = rsk.actype(+)
SELECT CI.*, (CASH_RECEIVING_T0+CASH_RECEIVING_T1+CASH_RECEIVING_T2+CASH_RECEIVING_T3) CASH_RECEIVING FROM BUF_CI_ACCOUNT CI WHERE CI.AFACCTNO ='SAFACCTNO'

SELECT CI.AFACCTNO,CF.FULLNAME,CI.BALDEFOVD FROM OL_ACCOUNT_CI CI,CFMAST CF,AFMAST AF WHERE CI.AFACCTNO=AF.ACCTNO AND AF.CUSTID=CF.CUSTID AND CI.AFACCTNO IN (SELECT DISTINCT AFACCTNO FROM VW_STRADE_MT_ACCOUNTS) AND CI.AFACCTNO IN(SAFACCTNOLIST)
SELECT * FROM VW_STRADE_MT_ACCOUNTS WHERE AFACCTNO='SAFACCTNO' AND TYPE=1 AND SUBSTR(BANKID,1,3)<>'302'
SELECT * FROM VW_STRADE_MT_ACCOUNTS WHERE AFACCTNO=:ACCTNO AND TYPE=1
SELECT * FROM VW_STRADE_MT_ACCOUNTS WHERE AFACCTNO=:ACCTNO AND TYPE=1 AND SUBSTR(BANKID,1,3)='302'

SELECT L.AFACCTNO,V.*,L.TYPE,L.REG_ACCTNO,L.REG_BENEFICARY_NAME,L.REG_BENEFICARY_INFO FROM VW_STRADE_LISTOF_MONEYTRANSFER V, VW_STRADE_MT_ACCOUNTS L WHERE V.REFID=L.REFID AND L.AFACCTNO LIKE '%SAFACCTNO%' ORDER BY V.TXDATE DESC

SELECT GWH.*,BI.BANKNAME FROM GWHOLDUNHOLDLOG GWH,AFMAST AF,BANKINFO BI WHERE GWH.SECACCOUNT=AF.ACCTNO AND GWH.BANKACCOUNT = AF.BANKACCTNO AND AF.BANKNAME=BI.BANKCODE AND GWH.SECACCOUNT='SAFACCTNO' AND GWH.TXDATE>=TO_DATE('SFROMDATE','DD/MM/RRRR') AND GWH.TXDATE<=TO_DATE('STODATE','DD/MM/RRRR') ORDER BY GWH.TXDATE DESC,GWH.AUTOID DESC
SELECT CASE WHEN ROUND(AVLWITHDRAW) > fn_getfowithdraw(:afacctno) THEN fn_getfowithdraw(:afacctno) ELSE ROUND(AVLWITHDRAW) END AVLWITHDRAW FROM buf_ci_account WHERE afacctno LIKE :afacctno
select CDVAL, CDCONTENT from allcode where CDTYPE='AD' AND CDNAME='ADSTATUS'
select CDVAL, CDCONTENT from allcode where CDTYPE='CI' AND CDNAME='RMSTATUS'
select CDVAL, CDCONTENT from allcode where CDTYPE='CI' AND CDNAME='RMSTATUS'
select ciname,ciaccount,cf.custodycd from cfotheracc, cfmast cf, afmast af where af.custid = cf.custid and cfotheracc.ciaccount=af.acctno and cfotheracc.afacctno=:ACCTNO
select BANK_NO, FULL_NAME from BANK_INFO order by full_name
select sb_branch_code, FULL_NAME,org_no from bank_branch_info WHERE BANK_NO=:BANK_NO order by full_name

SELECT ci.ACCTNO so_tieu_khoan,ci.balance - nvl(b.secureamt,0) - nvl(b.advamt,0) tien_mat, DECODE(sy.varvalue,'Y',0, nvl(avl.maxavlamt,0)) tien_ung_truoc , DECODE(sy.varvalue,'Y',0, nvl(GREATEST(avl.MAXAVLAMT-ROUND(avl.DEALPAID,0),0),0) - nvl(aaa.advamt,0)) phi_ung_du_tinh --, round(nvl(buf.avlwithdraw,0),0) , CASE WHEN round(nvl(buf.avlwithdraw,0),0) > fn_getfowithdraw(:ACCTNO) THEN fn_getfowithdraw(:ACCTNO) ELSE round(nvl(buf.avlwithdraw,0),0) END avlwithdraw FROM ( SELECT VW.ACCTNO, sum(VW.MAXAVLAMT) MAXAVLAMT, sum((CASE WHEN VW.TXDATE =TO_DATE(SYS.VARVALUE,'DD/MM/RRRR') AND ISVSD='N' THEN fn_getdealgrppaid(VW.ACCTNO) ELSE 0 END)/ (1-ADT.ADVRATE/100/360*VW.days)) DEALPAID FROM VW_ADVANCESCHEDULE VW, SYSVAR SYS,AFMAST AF, AFTYPE AFT ,ADTYPE ADT WHERE SYS.GRNAME='SYSTEM' AND SYS.VARNAME ='CURRDATE' AND VW.ACCTNO = AF.ACCTNo AND AF.ACTYPE=AFT.ACTYPE AND AFT.ADTYPE=ADT.ACTYPE group by VW.ACCTNO ) avl, cimast ci, v_getAccountAvlAdvance aaa , v_getbuyorderinfo b, v_getdealpaidbyaccount pd, buf_ci_account buf, sysvar sy WHERE ci.acctno = avl.acctno(+) and ci.acctno = aaa.afacctno(+) and ci.acctno = buf.afacctno (+) and ci.acctno = b.afacctno (+) and ci.acctno = pd.afacctno (+) and sy.GRNAME='MARGIN' AND SY.VARNAME='ISSTOPADV' and ci.acctno=:ACCTNO

SELECT CDVAL, CDCONTENT FROM ALLCODE WHERE (CDNAME != 'ORSTATUS' AND CDTYPE=:CDTYPE AND CDNAME=:CDNAME AND CDUSER='Y') UNION ALL SELECT CDVAL, CDCONTENT FROM ALLCODE WHERE (CDNAME = 'ORSTATUS' AND CDTYPE=:CDTYPE AND CDNAME=:CDNAME AND CDUSER='Y' AND CDVAL IN ('C','A','3','8','7','5','2','4','10','12'))

SELECT CDVAL, EN_CDCONTENT CDCONTENT FROM ALLCODE WHERE (CDNAME != 'ORSTATUS' AND CDTYPE=:CDTYPE AND CDNAME=:CDNAME AND CDUSER='Y') UNION ALL SELECT CDVAL, EN_CDCONTENT FROM ALLCODE WHERE (CDNAME = 'ORSTATUS' AND CDTYPE=:CDTYPE AND CDNAME=:CDNAME AND CDUSER='Y' AND CDVAL IN ('C','A','3','8','7','5','2','4','10','12'))

SELECT CDVAL, EN_CDCONTENT CDCONTENT FROM ALLCODE WHERE (CDNAME != 'ORSTATUS' AND CDTYPE=:CDTYPE AND CDNAME=:CDNAME AND CDUSER='Y') UNION ALL SELECT CDVAL, EN_CDCONTENT FROM ALLCODE WHERE (CDNAME = 'ORSTATUS' AND CDTYPE=:CDTYPE AND CDNAME=:CDNAME AND CDUSER='Y' AND CDVAL IN ('C','A','3','8','7','5','2','4','10','12'))
